results.title: A Dream to create a home
results.creator_credit: Wendy Walters, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Wendy Walters and her group of passionate people set about building a home for ninety people in Mill Park, Victoria. Through the dreams and idealism is frustration at the struggle to make this building home for so many different people.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Wendy Walters, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Wendy Walters and her group of passionate people set about building a home for ninety people in Mill Park, Victoria. Through the dreams and idealism is frustration at the struggle to make this building home for so many different people.
description_for_label: Wendy Walters and her group of passionate people set about building a home for ninety people in Mill Park, Victoria. Through the dreams and idealism is frustration at the struggle to make this building home for so many different people.

results.title: It's time to go
results.creator_credit: Cheryl Seymour, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: The Seymour family had struggled for years to keep the farm viable, despite rising interest rates, falling prices, droughts and fires. As the family got older and circumstances changed, it was time to make an important decision.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Cheryl Seymour, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: The Seymour family had struggled for years to keep the farm viable, despite rising interest rates, falling prices, droughts and fires. As the family got older and circumstances changed, it was time to make an important decision.
description_for_label: The Seymour family had struggled for years to keep the farm viable, despite rising interest rates, falling prices, droughts and fires. As the family got older and circumstances changed, it was time to make an important decision.

results.title: Anything can happen in life
results.creator_credit: Zenebech Tebeje, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Zenebech Tebeje reflects on growing up in her large family and how quickly life can change. But if you can adapt and embrace your new life, you can do anything.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Zenebech Tebeje, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Zenebech Tebeje reflects on growing up in her large family and how quickly life can change. But if you can adapt and embrace your new life, you can do anything.

results.title: Building
results.creator_credit: Dale Smith, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Dale Smith dedicates her story to her dad, a man of infinite creativity and resourcefulness. His inventiveness extended to building houses, caravans, mobile homes, trailers and, above all, a family who adore him.
